tijos.framework.networkcenter.ntp.NtpV3Packet

  • Packages that use NtpV3Packet 
    Package Description
    tijos.framework.networkcenter.ntp
    Network time protocol client class

    • Uses of NtpV3Packet in tijos.framework.networkcenter.ntp

      Classes in tijos.framework.networkcenter.ntp that implement NtpV3Packet 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NtpV3Impl
      Implementation of NtpV3Packet with methods converting Java objects to/from the Network Time Protocol (NTP) data message header format described in RFC-1305.
      Methods in tijos.framework.networkcenter.ntp that return NtpV3Packet 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NtpV3Packet TimeInfo.getMessage()
      Returns NTP message packet.

      Returns NTP packet reference identifier as IP address.

      Get refId as reference clock string (e.g.
